item.title: Committees
item.description: Preliminaries Basic machine learning concepts Probability Theory concepts expectation correlated random variable Analysis of Committees1 The committee is a native inspiration for how to combine several models(or we can say how to combine the outputs of several models). For example, we can combine all the models by: \[ y_{COM}(X)=\frac{1}{M}\sum_{m=1}^My_m(X)\tag{1} \] Then we want to find out whether this average prediction of models is better than every one of them.
